name: Neviweb
0:
”Alexa, brighten Kitchen to 60%”
”Alexa, brighten Dining Room to 60%”
”Alexa, make bedroom warmer”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Neviweb Skill and Alexa, you can interact with your Sinopé devices such as your thermostats, switches, dimmers, electrical load controllers, Sedna valves, and even your scenes.

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your Neviweb account and say, "Alexa, discover devices.” 

The Neviweb Skill is only compatible with devices connected to a Sinopé gateway or Sinopé Wi-Fi devices. 

Scenes: 
To control scenes, simply tell Alexa to turn on <scene name>. 
- "Alexa, turn on Relax."
- "Alexa, turn on Energize.”
 
You can create your scenes on the Neviweb app! Once your new scenes are created, simply ask "Alexa, discover devices" to have them work with Amazon Alexa.

Rooms: 
To control several lights in the same room, simply tell Alexa to turn on <room name>. 
- “Alexa, turn on Bedroom.”
- “Alexa, brighten Kitchen to 60%”.
 
To define rooms:
- Create an Alexa group and add the device(s) to the group in the Alexa App. More information is available at http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups.
 
Light Controls:
- You can turn devices on/off, for example: « Alexa, turn on my Bedroom lights » or « Alexa, turn off the Kitchen lights .»
- You can change the brightness, for example: « Alexa, brighten Dining Room to 60% », or « Alexa, dim the Living Room lights .»

Thermostat Control:
- You can set the temperature to different values, for example: « Alexa, set kitchen temperature to 19 degrees » or « Alexa, make bedroom warmer .»

Valve Controls:
- You can change your valve status, for example: « Alexa, turn on the valve in the basement » or « Alexa, turn off the valve in the service room .»

Find more information about connecting Smart Home devices at http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home.
